clauses.title: Sulina/Bystroe Channel Passage
clauses.text: VESSEL TO TRANSIT VIA SULINA OR BYSTROE CHANNEL AS PER MASTER'S DISCRETION. ALL CHANNEL/PILOTAGE DUES FOR OWNERS ACCOUNT.

clauses.title: Air Raids Clause
clauses.text: IN CASE OF AIR RAIDS/ALERTS DURING LOADING, TIME USED NOT TO COUNT AS LAYTIME. MASTER TO FOLLOW PORT AUTHORITIES INSTRUCTIONS.

clauses.title: Combined Demurrage/Detention
clauses.text: DEMURRAGE/DETENTION TO BE COMBINED FOR LOADING PORT INCLUDING ANY TIME LOST DUE TO CHANNEL TRANSIT DELAYS.

clauses.title: Danube Draft Restrictions
clauses.text: OWNERS TO SATISFY THEMSELVES WITH PREVAILING DRAFT RESTRICTIONS IN DANUBE PORTS AND CHANNELS PRIOR TO FIXING.

clauses.title: River Berth Restrictions
clauses.text: OWNERS TO SATISFY THEMSELVES WITH ANY KIND OF LOADING BERTH/PORT/CHANNEL/RIVER RESTRICTIONS.

clauses.title: JCC Inspection Clause
clauses.text: VESSEL SUBJECT TO JCC (JOINT COORDINATION CENTRE) INSPECTION PRIOR TO ENTERING/LEAVING UKRAINIAN WATERS. ANY DELAYS DUE TO JCC FOR OWNERS ACCOUNT.

clauses.title: ERWI Clause
clauses.text: ENGLISH, RUSSIAN AND WORLDWIDE INSTITUTE CLAUSES TO APPLY. VESSEL TO HAVE VALID WAR RISK INSURANCE COVERING UKRAINIAN WATERS.

clauses.title: War Cancellation Clause
clauses.text: IF HOSTILITIES PREVENT SAFE ACCESS TO LOADING PORT, EITHER PARTY MAY CANCEL THIS CONTRACT WITHOUT PENALTY, PROVIDED NOTICE GIVEN WITHIN 48 HRS.

clauses.title: Additional War Insurance
clauses.text: ANY ADDITIONAL WAR RISK PREMIUM (AWRP) FOR UKRAINIAN WATERS TO BE FOR CHARTERERS ACCOUNT, UP TO USD [AMOUNT] PER DAY.

clauses.title: Ukraine NOR Tendering
clauses.text: AT LOAD PORT N.O.R. TO BE TENDERED ON WORKING DAYS DURING OFFICE HRS (08:00-17:00 HRS LT) FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY.

clauses.title: Ukraine Holiday Calendar
clauses.text: HOLIDAYS AS PER UKRAINE CALENDAR FOR THE RELEVANT YEAR.

clauses.title: Egypt NOR Tendering
clauses.text: AT DISCHARGE PORT N.O.R. TO BE TENDERED ON WORKING DAYS DURING OFFICE HRS (08:00-12:00 HRS LT) FROM SUNDAY TO THURSDAY.

clauses.title: Egypt Sampling Requirements
clauses.text: CARGO SAMPLING AND ANALYSIS TO BE CARRIED OUT BY APPROVED SURVEYOR AT DISCHARGE PORT. SAMPLING TIME NOT TO COUNT AS LAYTIME.

clauses.title: SHINC/FHINC Clause
clauses.text: SUNDAYS AND HOLIDAYS INCLUDED (SHINC) AT LOAD PORT. FRIDAYS AND HOLIDAYS INCLUDED (FHINC) AT DISCHARGE PORT (EGYPT).

clauses.title: Egypt Documents Time
clauses.text: TIME FOR DOCUMENTS TO BE PRESENTED AT DISCHARGE PORT: 72 HRS PRIOR VESSEL'S ETA. DELAY IN DOCUMENTS PRESENTATION NOT TO AFFECT LAYTIME.

clauses.title: Egypt Canal Dues
clauses.text: SUEZ CANAL DUES, IF APPLICABLE, FOR CHARTERERS ACCOUNT.

clauses.title: Reni Port Restrictions
clauses.text: RENI PORT: MAX DRAFT 5.5M SW, MAX LOA 150M, MAX BEAM 22M. VESSEL TO COMPLY WITH ALL BERTH/CHANNEL RESTRICTIONS.

clauses.title: Izmail Port Restrictions
clauses.text: IZMAIL PORT: MAX DRAFT 5.5M SW, MAX LOA 145M. VESSEL TO SATISFY HERSELF WITH PREVAILING RESTRICTIONS.

clauses.title: Pivdennyi Port Clause
clauses.text: PIVDENNYI (YUZHNY) PORT: VESSEL TO COMPLY WITH PORT AUTHORITY REQUIREMENTS AND TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT SCHEME.

clauses.title: Odesa Port Clause
clauses.text: ODESA PORT: VESSEL TO COMPLY WITH ALL PORT AUTHORITY REQUIREMENTS. BERTH ALLOCATION SUBJECT TO PORT MASTER'S DISCRETION.

clauses.title: Alexandria Port Clause
clauses.text: ALEXANDRIA: 1 SB ALWAYS AFLOAT. VESSEL TO COMPLY WITH PORT AUTHORITY REQUIREMENTS AND QUARANTINE PROCEDURES.

clauses.title: Damietta Port Clause
clauses.text: DAMIETTA: 1 SB ALWAYS AFLOAT. BERTH SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND PORT CONGESTION.

clauses.title: Grain Description
clauses.text: CARGO: [QUANTITY] MTS (+/- [TOLERANCE]% MOLCO) OF [CARGO_TYPE] IN BULK STW ABT [STW_MIN]-[STW_MAX] CF/T WOG.

clauses.title: Previous Cargo
clauses.text: PREVIOUS CARGO: GRAIN OR GRAIN SUITABLE. IF DIFFERENT CARGO CARRIED PRIOR, HOLDS TO BE CLEANED TO GRAIN STANDARD AT OWNERS TIME AND EXPENSE.

clauses.title: Trimming Clause
clauses.text: CARGO TO BE TRIMMED FREE OF CHARGE TO OWNERS. CHARTERERS TO PROVIDE SUFFICIENT TRIMMING IF REQUIRED BY MASTER.

clauses.title: Independent Surveyor
clauses.text: INDEPENDENT SURVEYOR TO BE APPOINTED BY CHARTERERS AT LOAD AND DISCHARGE PORTS. SURVEYOR'S FIGURES TO BE BINDING FOR FREIGHT CALCULATION.

clauses.title: STW Verification
clauses.text: STOWAGE FACTOR (STW) TO BE VERIFIED BY CHARTERERS PRIOR TO LOADING. ACTUAL STW MAY VARY DUE TO MOISTURE CONTENT AND GRADE.

clauses.title: Fumigation
clauses.text: FUMIGATION, IF REQUIRED BY RECEIVER/AUTHORITIES, TO BE FOR CHARTERERS ACCOUNT. VESSEL TO PROVIDE GASTIGHT HOLDS.

clauses.title: Laytime Commencement
clauses.text: LAYTIME TO COMMENCE AT 0800 HRS LT ON THE NEXT WORKING DAY AFTER VALID NOR TENDERED, VESSEL MOORED ABAL (ALWAYS BERTH ALWAYS LOADING/DISCHARGING).

clauses.title: Laytime Calculation
clauses.text: LAYTIME: [LOAD_RATE] MTS PER WWD SHINC AT LOAD PORT, [DISCH_RATE] MTS PER WWD FHINC AT DISCHARGE PORT.

clauses.title: Reversible Laytime
clauses.text: LAYTIME TO BE REVERSIBLE BETWEEN LOADING AND DISCHARGING PORTS.

clauses.title: Demurrage Rate
clauses.text: DEMURRAGE: USD [RATE] PER DAY PRO RATA (PDPR). FULL DESPATCH (FD) BOTH ENDS (BENDS), LESS BROKERAGE COMMISSION.

clauses.title: Demurrage Payment
clauses.text: DEMURRAGE PAYABLE WITHIN 30 DAYS UPON RECEIPT OF OWNERS SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS INCLUDING TIME SHEET AND INVOICES.

clauses.title: Half Despatch
clauses.text: DESPATCH: HALF DEMURRAGE (DHD) ON ALL TIME SAVED AT BOTH ENDS.

clauses.title: Freight Rate
clauses.text: FREIGHT: USD [RATE] PMT FIOST (FREE IN OUT STOWED TRIMMED).

clauses.title: Freight Payment
clauses.text: FREIGHT PAYABLE 100% WITHIN 5 BANKING DAYS AFTER COMPLETION OF LOADING AND SIGNING/RELEASING BILLS OF LADING.

clauses.title: Commission
clauses.text: ADDRESS COMMISSION: [PERCENTAGE]% TO CHARTERERS. BROKERAGE COMMISSION: [PERCENTAGE]% TO BROKERS.

clauses.title: GSB(A) Clause
clauses.text: GSB(A): GOOD SAFE BERTH, ALWAYS AFLOAT.

clauses.title: ISM/ISPS Compliance
clauses.text: VESSEL TO BE ISM/ISPS COMPLIANT WITH ALL VALID CERTIFICATES FOR THE INTENDED VOYAGE.

clauses.title: Arbitration Clause
clauses.text: ANY DISPUTE ARISING FROM THIS CHARTER PARTY TO BE REFERRED TO ARBITRATION IN LONDON ACCORDING TO ENGLISH LAW.

clauses.title: BIMCO Sanctions Clause
clauses.text: BIMCO SANCTIONS CLAUSE 2020 TO APPLY.

clauses.title: Proforma Reference
clauses.text: OTHERWISE AS PER ATTACHED CHARTERERS PROFORMA C/P BASED ON SYNACOMEX 2000, LOGICALLY AMENDED AS PER MAIN TERMS AGREED (WHICH ALWAYS PREVAIL).

clauses.title: Force Majeure
clauses.text: NEITHER PARTY SHALL BE LIABLE FOR ANY FAILURE TO PERFORM DUE TO FORCE MAJEURE EVENTS INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WAR, STRIKES, NATURAL DISASTERS.

clauses.title: Vessel Particulars
clauses.text: VESSEL: TBN. OWNERS TO NOMINATE SUITABLE VESSEL WITHIN [DAYS] DAYS PRIOR TO LAYCAN.

clauses.title: Vessel Approval
clauses.text: VESSEL SUBJECT TO CHARTERERS/RECEIVERS APPROVAL. CHARTERERS TO RESPOND WITHIN 24 HOURS OF NOMINATION.

clauses.title: Vessel Age
clauses.text: VESSEL NOT TO EXCEED [AGE] YEARS OF AGE AT TIME OF LOADING.

clauses.title: OR SUB Clause
clauses.text: OR SUB: OWNERS SUBJECTS TO BE LIFTED WITHIN 24 HRS OF OWNERS CONFIRMATION.

categories.name: Country-Specific Clauses
categories.description: Clauses related to specific countries (Ukraine, Egypt, etc.)

categories.name: Port-Specific Clauses
categories.description: Clauses for specific ports with restrictions and requirements

categories.name: Cargo Clauses
categories.description: Clauses related to cargo type (grain, steel, etc.)

categories.name: Freight Clauses
categories.description: Freight rate, payment, and commission terms
